definition: iAsk.com, the search engine of Sina 新浪
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Childhood I love some of the adults asking meaningless questions.
sentences.chinese: 童年的我愛問一些在大人看來毫無意義的問題。

sentences.english: Love asked knowledge, another old woman, "Who helped me?"
sentences.chinese: 愛問知識是誰幫助了我。

sentences.english: That's why. You're always asking me questions.
sentences.chinese: 那是因爲你老愛問我一些不着邊的問題。

definition: lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
to get straight to the point (idiom)
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
to be absent-minded/to desert/to abscond from the army/absent without leave (AWOL)
lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
sugar-coated bullets, term used by Mao (originally in 1949) to refer to corrupting bourgeois influences
poor wretch/pauper/destitute man/poverty-stricken peasant/penniless good-for-nothing/impecunious vagabond
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
